price: 48. Y los (ídolos) que invocaban con anterioridad los abandonarán, y (los idólatras) sabrán que no tendrán escapatoria alguna.
arabic: وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَدۡعُونَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَظَنُّواْ مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yadʿūna min qablu waẓannū mā lahum min maḥīṣin
